items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Scalp Protector is the perfect thin protective barrier for humid environments.">
items.storedetaileddescription: Walker Tape®’s Scalp Protector is the perfect thin protective barrier for humid environments. This easy-to-use protectant helps keep the hold of the adhesives strong and skin irritation at bay. An ideal choice for wearers who live active lifestyles or have oily skin.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Use in a well-ventilated area. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use.

      

   

Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

   

  1. Prepare the scalp with 99% Alcohol.
  2. Before applying any adhesive, apply one coat of Scalp Protector thinly on the scalp. 
  3. Let dry until not tacky to touch, then apply adhesive or tape. Bear in mind that with scalp protectors, the tape or adhesive will start to adhere quickly.
  4. This product is not meant to replace tape or liquid adhesive.
items.pagetitle: Scalp Protector - 2 fl oz, Spray | Walker Tape
